topic.title: how to torbrowser with mac os
topic.body: using mac os, I wonder how to launch zeronet with torbrowser instead of default browser? (firefox in my case)

1_145w1yniK8RaBKx468iMXcgunojqrJFNG5.body:
> [cadenoro](#comment_4_1vAdpJiyYEHcDZoJn93QcjzaFVKHHPg1F): I find it easier to close the launched browser, then launch the Tor with the http://127.0.0.1:43110 URL.

I am not sure but if you do that, your IP and your nickname are probably somewhere readable. So I think its pointless to use torbrowser afterwards.
